Description: To be clear, I sold this instrument for $419 and the neck broke in shipping. I repaired the neck break and have relisted for $300. This model has an odd electrics configuration, with three humbuckers but only a three way switch (and just two volume two tone knobs) Are you buying this for a beginning player?, please ask me specifically and I will restring, as well as include Picks, Cable, tuner and strap. (All used but clean) - Not included if you don't remind me prior to shipping. No hassle after Christmas returns (You can return for any reason, but I only pay return shipping if there is a problem not specified in this listing) Weight 8lbs 5 ozBody Material Mahogany Neck Material Mahogany Neck Shape SlimTaper™; D-profile Neck Joint Glued-in, set neck Truss Rod Adjustable Scale Length 24.75 Fingerboard Material Pearloid block inlay Fingerboard Radius 12” Frets 22 medium jumbo Pickups Alnico Classic Humbuckers Pickup Selector Epiphone all-metal 3-way toggle switch Controls 1-neck volume, 1-neck tone, 1 bridge volume, 1-bridge tone Bridge Locktone™ Tune-o-matic/Stopbar Nut Width 1.68” Hardware Gold Binding 7-layer body front and back, 5-layer headstock, 1-layer fingerboard
Title: 2011 Epiphone Les Paul Black Beauty - OHSC - Neck Repair
ConditionDescription: Instrument is in good used condition. Light scratching from play. (All this could be buffed out). Gold hardware is holding up well. Cosmetic condition 7 of 10. Neck cracked in shipping, neck glued, clamped, sanded and compounded. You can see the repair, but blindfolded you could not feel it. Electrics good, action low, intonated properly, no fret wire wear. Playability 9 of 10. Case has some scuffs but also in good shape. (no keys)
